original_text: If the sun be risen upon him, there shall be blood shed for him; for he should make full restitution; if he have nothing, then he shall be sold for his theft.
korean_text: 해 돋은 후에는 피 흘린 죄가 있으리라 도둑은 반드시 배상할 것이나 배상할 것이 없으면 그 몸을 팔아 그 도둑질한 것을 배상할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If the sun be risen upon him,
there shall be blood shed for him;
for he should make full restitution;
then he shall be sold for his theft.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 도둑질 때문에 팔려야 할 것이다
